4306740.name: Protectors of Prucia
4306740.description:
Enter the world of Prucia and push back the Scourge threatening the continent. Choose your character and a trusted mercenary companion with RPG progression, powerful class skills, attribute points, and loot-driven builds. Every delve challenges your positioning, timing, and tactical creativity as you fight through grid‑based, turn‑based encounters where every tile matters.

Protectors of Prucia blends classic dungeon‑crawler exploration with modern tactical combat. Navigate floor layouts, choose when to engage or retreat, and manage your resources as you descend. Between runs, return to town to stash gear, refine your loadout, and prepare for the next push into the dark.

Choose from 10 Unique Classes

Each class comes with a variety of skills, offering a wide range of tactical identities and playstyles:

  • Warrior – frontline bruiser with heavy strikes and defensive stances

  • Paladin of Gibil – front line paladin that can dual-wield maces seeking retribution

  • Paladin of Kisar – Armed with a hand-crossbow and specializing in elemental enchantments

  • Paladin of Zinf – A caster and AOE focused Paladin

  • Druid – nature‑shaper who commands beasts and the earth itself

  • Hunter of the Damned – ranged slayer built for precision using mechanical devices

  • Monk – agile martial artist with uses 6 rings and chi‑based techniques

  • Spellsword – hybrid fighter mixing blade combat with elemental spellcasting

  • Wizard – high‑impact caster with devastating area spells and control magic

  • Necromancer – cast afflictions, animate dead, metal golem, and cast magical strikes. 

Mix class skills with loot affixes, elemental synergies, and defensive layers to craft your own build identity.

Key Features

  • Turn-based tactical combat on a grid where movement, range, and turn order matter

  • Action dice that fuel abilities and create big tactical turns

  • Hero + companion party system for layered strategy

  • Loot-driven items with a variety of affixes

  • Town hub for inventory management, vendors, and gear refinement

  • Replayable dungeon runs with evolving encounters and ongoing balance updates

Protectors of Prucia is in active development (Early Access). Expect new content, balance passes, and continuous polish as the world — and the Scourge — grows.
